lgpl3.comb

Class PInEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • lgpl3.comb.Pnk_A
      • lgpl3.comb.Pnk_H
        • lgpl3.comb.Pnk_J
          • lgpl3.comb.Pnk_W
            • lgpl3.comb.Pnk_Z
              • lgpl3.comb.PByToInEx
                • lgpl3.comb.PInEx

  • public abstract class PInEx
extends PByToInEx
    排容原理.
    例如 :
    A, B, C, D 排成一列, 但 A 不排第 1 位, B 不排第 2 位的方法數 :
    為 4 人有 2 人是限定條件 inEx(4,2).

    To return the inclusion and exclusion function result, the number of
    that n people line up but k guys not at their position.
    PInEx(n,k)=C(k,0)*n! -C(k,1)*(n-1)! +C(k,2)*(n-2)! - ... +-C(k,k)*(n-k)!
    Version:
    2022/03/22_11:20:00
    src
    See Also:
    Dnk

    • Method Detail

      • colWNEqK

        public static void colWNEqK(int baseB32,
            int rmdB32,
            int headKToEx,
            int exBit,
            long prefix,
            KArV32 ret,
            int lv)
        回傳亂序數.
        即 n 個人排成一列後解散再排成一列, 沒有人排在自己原先的位置的方法數.
        D(n)=nD(n-1)+(-1)^n
        0, 1, 2, 9, 44, 265, 1854,...
        To return the number of ways that n people line up then dismiss, and
        line up again but nobody is at the previous position.

        回傳亂序數.
        即 n 個人排成一列後解散再排成一列, 沒有人排在自己原先的位置的方法數.
        D(n)=nD(n-1)+(-1)^n
        0, 1, 2, 9, 44, 265, 1854,...
        To return the number of ways that n people line up then dismiss, and
        line up again but nobody is at the previous position.
